Subject: Re: [junit] TestCase#setUp
From: Vladimir Bossicard <vladimir@...>

> When a class is added to a test suite and that test suite is run, it
> seems strange to me that the method TestCase#setUp runs every time a
> test method runs.  So if you have twenty test methods in a class and
> you add that class to a test suite, the method setUp runs twenty
> times.

When you run a TestSuite, the framework does _not_ create one instance of the TestSuite class and then pick up a test method to execute _but_ creates one instance of the TestSuite class for _each_ test method.  If you have 20 test methods in a TestSuite, the framework will create 20 instances of the TestSuite class and run one method in each instance.  The setUp method will then be executed one time per instance -> 20 times for your entire TestSuite.

-Vladimir
